name: Mix, Drink and Hope for the Worst
name_original: Mix, Drink and Hope for the Worst
description:
Mix, Drink and Hope for the Worst is the game where a group of mages try to make the absolute worst magic potion ever made, to beat the ruler of Hell!

More details on how to play are on the tutorial page inside the game.

The game is meant to be played on a controller (XBox One), and with 2-4 players.

Keyboard controls :

A: space

B: F

X: X

Y: Z

L Trigger: Q

R Trigger: R

Start: Enter

Select: Backspace

Credits:

Programming: Mattys Gervais, Thomas Bergeron, Antoine Tremblay-Simard, William Ferguson

Graphics: Angélique Dubé

Gameplay: All of the above

Music & SFX: Simon Bergeron
